channel.title: infrastructure on Fink broker
channel.description: Recent content in infrastructure on Fink broker

item.title: Infrastructures in Fink
item.description: Fink infrastructure Let’s take the opportunity of the bad turn of recent events to talk and learn a bit more on the infrastructure in place for Fink. Fink is deployed on the cloud, that is each box in the Figure is an independent set of machines where specific software are running and executing tasks. Nightly alert processing The central part of the processing in Fink is the Apache Spark cluster (see fink-broker).
